content: From the information available, Tito's main focus was on his art throughout his life, and he dedicated himself to his craft. However, he was also known for his love of music and often incorporated it into his art. Jazz was a particular passion of his, and he was friends with many prominent musicians of his time, including Dizzy Gillespie and Charlie Parker. Tito was also a vocal advocate and activist for social justice causes, particularly those related to the Puerto Rican community, often using his art as a way to raise awareness and spark change.
